https://rdm.abcd-j.de/instructions.html#: The dataset contains longitudinal bulk sequencing data of FACS sorted  T cells (CD3+CD4+, CD3+CD8+, CD3+CD4+CCR7+, CD3+CD4+CCR7-, CD3+CD8+CCR7+, CD3+CD8+CCR7-) from peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) of 4 Multiple Sclerosis (MS) patients  treated with fingolimod (FTY720) compared to  2 untreated controls.  For treated patients TP1: Baseline; TP2: 6-12 months. For untreated controls TP1: m1; TP2: 6-12 months
Multiple Sclerosis, bulk sequencing, peripheral blood, fingolimod
